programme.title: Discovering the World's Culture
programme.desc: Nikki Bedi travels to Mardin in the south east of Turkey to immerse herself in the arts and culture of the region. The area is well known for its historic old town and unique landscape but is fast becoming a central player in Turkey's arts scene. In 2024, Mardin is playing host to its sixth biennial, and Nikki will discover this festival through the eyes of local and international artists. Influential figures in the art world, like Ahmet Ogut, Gunes Terkol and Ayse Erkman, are showing exhibitions at the biennial and discussing the role that creative endeavour plays in their lives. Nikki meets the local artists seeking to embrace the local landscape and use the area for inspiration. And she visits local sculptor Nurettin Cakmak and glasswork artist Tacettin Ebu Barak to find out how the mythical Turkish figure of the Shahmaran plays into their work.

programme.title: World's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.sub-title: Japan's New Golden Route Season 1, Episode 1
programme.desc: Marking the 60th anniversary of Japan's famous Shinkansen, rail enthusiast Paul Carter ventures along a new coastal rail route. Join Paul's travels from Tokyo, as he stops at the stunning mountain springs of Unizakeonsen, sees Kanazawa, a city that gleams with gold, and meets the resilient artisans of Wajima as they fight to save age-old crafts. Relax and enjoy the ride as Paul seamlessly blends high-speed rail with slow travel, uncovering hidden gems along the New Golden Route.

programme.title: Ukraine: Growing Up Under Fire
programme.desc: Some 2,000 children have been injured or killed since Russia launched its full-scale invasion of Ukraine in 2022, and this year the number has surged. But the suffering caused by this war is not only physical: many young Ukrainians are also dealing with the immense psychological strain of a life under fire, displaced from their homes or with the loss of loved ones. In a war that has interrupted childhood, placing normal life on hold, we meet three young Ukrainians to see how they - and those caring for them - cope.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: Live from Singapore, the latest international news from the BBC.

programme.title: 100 Women
programme.sub-title: Raid at the Brothel Next Door
programme.desc: It all starts with a friendly voice that offers vulnerable women an opportunity when they need it the most - until the pin drops, and they realise their lives will never be the same. In Spain, both a destination and a transit country for victims trafficked for sex into Europe mostly from Latin America and Africa, an elite group of women investigators are fighting international gangs to liberate women from the sinister trap they are caught in. BBC 100 Women followed them as they engage in round-the-clock surveillance operations and raids, with unprecedented access into the heart of a global crime that is often hidden just in the flat next door.

programme.title: Panorama
programme.sub-title: Can Scientists Save the World? - Panorama
programme.desc: Richard Bilton meets scientists working on solutions to climate change. Innovations include mechanical trees that absorb carbon, machines that brighten clouds and a solar reactor that makes fuel from fresh air. The scientists say their inventions have been shown to work at small scale but would need massive investment to reduce the effect of our greenhouse gas emissions. Richard investigates whether they can really make a difference.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow
programme.desc: A sceptical 18th-century detective is sent to a small hamlet supposedly terrorised by a demonic headless horseman who decapitates his victims. The investigator refuses to believe in the supernatural, convinced a human killer is behind the murders - but the legend proves to be all too true. Tim Burton's gothic horror, starring Johnny Depp, Christina Ricci, Miranda Richardson and Christopher Walken

programme.title: Ramsay's 24 Hours to Hell and Back
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Bear's Ben Pizza in Conway, Arkansas, a university town with a large student and faculty population. Friends Brad and Steven launched the joint in 2008 and initially it was a success, but business dropped off due to having a reputation for passionless food - most of which is microwaved

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Katharine Schmidt, executive director of non-profit organisation Food Banks Canada, dons a disguise to help out in one of the company's soup kitchens. Almost one million citizens, 40 per cent of them children, rely on the company's services each month

programme.title: Sunday Brunch
programme.desc: Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer present highlights from Sunday Brunch

programme.title: Jamie's Comfort Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver gives some of the nation's favourite dishes a twist, reinventing British classics, rustling up outdoor treats and transforming old-school puddings

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne offers to host a dinner party to celebrate Niles' latest purchase, knowing that previous soirees held by the brothers have ended badly. However, her own efforts fail to work out much better and Frasier is forced to lend a clandestine hand, while Martin masquerades as a famous artist

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: A forthcoming squash tournament has Frasier on the lookout for a new partner, and an attractive gym coach seems to fit the bill. When lust blooms, the teacher's aggressive performance techniques cannot help but remind the psychiatrist of his old gym teacher. Comedy, guest starring Jeanne Tripplehorn and Bob Hoskins, with Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne's mother infuriates Martin by meddling in his romantic affairs, while Frasier and Niles take part in a charity cycling event - even though neither of them knows how to ride a bike

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: Kenny on the Couch Season 10, Episode 17
programme.desc: Martin dispenses advice to a depressed Kenny, leaving Frasier feeling jealous, and a yoga class goes badly for Niles, who is taken aback to discover he is not as supple as Daphne. Guest starring Alan Cumming

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: A mischievous trio of talking chipmunks invade a struggling songwriter's home. When the furry critters demonstrate a remarkable talent for singing, he agrees to help them find fame and fortune. However, an unscrupulous record company boss has other plans. Children's comedy, starring Jason Lee and David Cross, with the voices of Justin Long, Matthew Gray Gubler and Jesse McCartney

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Marge Be Not Proud Season 7, Episode 11
programme.desc: Marge learns Bart has been caught shoplifting the latest video game, and decides it is high time he learned to behave more responsibly

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Kill Gil, Volumes I & II Season 18, Episode 8
programme.desc: Department store Santa Gil grants Lisa's Christmas wish, but loses his job as a result. Feeling guilty, the family offers him a bed for the night - but he promptly moves in, along with all of his belongings. As the uninvited lodger becomes a pest, Marge looks for ways to get rid of him

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Skinner's Sense of Snow Season 12, Episode 8
programme.desc: A snowstorm leaves Bart, Lisa and their fellow students trapped inside Springfield Elementary and it is not long before the pupils are running amok. Homer and Ned Flanders are left to mount the rescue operation to save the kids - and Principal Skinner

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: After a failed Black Friday shopping spree, Marge is determined to fix Christmas, but Homer and the kids surprise Marge with a holiday at a Florida resort

programme.title: Homegrown Christmas
programme.desc: A former CEO returns to her home town in search of some perspective, but ends up having a tense encounter with an old boyfriend from her teenage years. When they are forced to work together on a high school dance, it leads them to reflect on the choices they have made in their lives and recapture their old feelings for one another. Romantic drama, starring Lori Loughlin and Victor Webster

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The week begins at the Dog Inn in Longridge, Lancashire. Married couple Stu and Ali hope to impress their guests with a trip to a farm to see some baby lambs

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition continues at Ullswater View in the Lake District, where Julie and her friend Sarah plan to give the B&Bers a touch of luxury. The group brave wet, windy conditions during a boat trip on the lake, and vibrant views from the breakfast room boost everyone's spirits. Until a sausage causes a problem

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week is at String of Horses in Cumbria where hosts Sue and Judith hope their guests enjoy the community feel of the place

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.sub-title: Cove Farm, East Lothian Season 2024, Episode 39
programme.desc: The week's final visit is to East Lothian, where husband and wife Gavin and Rosie host at Cove Farm. They're hoping to persuade their guests of the merits of glamping, convincing their guests to embrace the great outdoors with a wood-fired hot tub. However, tensions rise during a trip to a local brewery - and they're not eased by a complaint about the sleeping situation

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.sub-title: Payment Day, Fri June 7, 2024 Season 2024, Episode 40
programme.desc: Payment day finds the B&Bers trying to get their heads around all manner of things, from facilities faults to shoddy sleep scores. After a tension-filled visit last time around, there are plenty of scores to be settled, but whoever will reign supreme when the payments are revealed is anything but certain

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: A heartless TV executive is cruel to his employees and sees the festive season as nothing more than an opportunity to make money. However, on Christmas Eve, three ghosts arrive in the night and challenge him to change his cynical ways by showing him his past, present and future. Comedy based on Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol, starring Bill Murray, Karen Allen, John Forsythe, David Johansen and Carol Kane

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young shop assistant in Victorian England enters a magical parallel world in search of a fallen star to give to the girl of his dreams. However, the star in question is in fact a beautiful woman, who he helps flee from a wicked witch and a murderous prince. Fantasy adventure, based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with Charlie Cox, Claire Danes, Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert De Niro, Mark Strong and Sienna Miller. Narrated by Ian McKellen

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: With sport and weather

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi

programme.title: Bohemian Rhapsody
programme.desc: Freddie Mercury and Queen go from playing small venues to becoming one of the biggest rock bands in the world. While Freddie comes to terms with his sexuality, outside forces threaten to tear the group apart, until their defining moment at Live Aid in July 1985. Oscar-winning biopic, starring Rami Malek, Lucy Boynton and Gwilym Lee

programme.title: Apocalypse Now: Final Cut
programme.desc: An army captain is sent on a top-secret mission into Cambodia, where his goal is to find and assassinate a renegade colonel who has gone insane and is worshipped by his followers as a god. However, as his patrol boat journeys further upriver, the conflict and disarray surrounding him becomes increasingly disturbing and nightmarish. Extended version of Francis Ford Coppola's acclaimed Vietnam War drama - re-edited in 2019 by the director himself to mark the film's 40th anniversary. Starring Martin Sheen, Marlon Brando and Robert Duvall

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: The outspoken chef comes to the aid of a Blackpool restaurant that has been praised by the town's tourist board but largely ignored by the general public. Gordon has to sort out a disorganised menu, a chef who cannot handle the demands of the kitchen and a badly demoralised staff before the business can become a success

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Richard Andersen, the new CEO of sports and entertainment complex Northlands, is seeking to turn around the company's fortunes - so he goes undercover to find out what his employees make of his changes. He dons a fat suit and a new identity, and soon makes discoveries about staff morale and equipment, before the story of one worker's loss makes him realise the important steps he has to take

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Will Peri have second thoughts about marrying Abe after her mum's words of caution? The Osbornes rally around Nancy following her shock collapse. A day of celebration takes an unexpected turn. A family try to rebuild. And will hazy memories reveal a shocking truth? Marie's mouth runs away with her, making her seem guilty of a crime. With something feeling off, can the McQueens work together to get to the bottom of it? Writers: Emily Gascoyne, Richard Burke; Dir: Abe Juckes; Prod Co: Lime Pictures

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
programme.desc: The singing trio are left in the care of their manager's nephew and try to save a school's music programme by winning a battle-of-the-bands competition. However, they encounter fierce rivalry from another group of musical rodents. Comedy, starring Zachary Levi, Jason Lee and David Cross, with the voices of Justin Long and Christina Applegate

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: She of Little Faith Season 13, Episode 6
programme.desc: Mr Burns takes over the running of the local church and turns it into a profitable business, prompting a disgusted Lisa to leave the congregation in protest and become a Buddhist instead. Featuring the guest voice of Richard Gere

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Skinner's Sense of Snow Season 12, Episode 8

programme.title: Sunday Brunch
programme.desc: Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer are joined by Steve Pemberton, Joel Dommett, Ella Lily Hyland, Jay Rayner and Zoe Birkett. With live music from Reverend and the Makers

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are entrusted into the care of their sinister uncle, a master of disguise who intends to kill them for the family fortune. Quickly realising he is up to no good, the children flee, moving from one prospective guardian to the next - but their wily relative is never far behind. Comedy adventure based on the children's books, starring Jim Carrey, Meryl Streep, Jude Law, Liam Aitken and Emily Browning, with Kara and Shelby Hoffman

programme.title: The Snowman
programme.desc: Raymond Briggs' festive favourite, a wordless animated fantasy telling the story of a small boy whose snowman magically comes to life and whisks him off on the journey of a lifetime to the North Pole. Howard Blake's score includes the award-winning song Walking in the Air, which was taken to number five in the charts by a young Aled Jones, but is here sung by Peter Auty

programme.title: Ron's Gone Wrong
programme.desc: The story of Barney, an awkward middle-schooler and Ron, his new walking, talking, digitally connected device. Ron's malfunctions set against the backdrop of the social-media age launch them on a journey to learn about true friendship. Animated comedy, with the voices of Zach Galifianakis, Jack Dylan Grazer, Ed Helms and Olivia Colman

programme.title: The Snowman and the Snowdog
programme.desc: Animated sequel to Raymond Briggs' classic festive tale The Snowman, telling the story of another youngster's magical Christmas. A boy's snowman and snowdog come to life at the stroke of midnight and take him on an adventure to the North Pole, where he and his new companions meet an assortment of colourful characters, including Santa himself, before returning home - where a wonderful surprise awaits

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: With sport and weather

programme.title: London Zoo at Christmas
programme.desc: A look into the daily goings-on of the world's oldest scientific zoo, revealing how keepers and other staff make the holiday magic happen. From complicated animal moves and meeting the zoo's newest and youngest additions, to medical check-ups and transforming the zoo into a magical winter wonderland, cameras are on hand to capture some truly unique moments

programme.title: Alpine Train at Christmas
programme.desc: A festive ride on the illustrious Bernina Express, one of the most picturesque trains in the world, beginning in Chur, the oldest town in Switzerland, and travelling through the Alpine landscape to the town of Tirano in Italy. Along the way, the train visits the Morteratsch Glacier, the Landwasser Viaduct and Lago Bianco, meeting people who live and work in the area including an artisan cheese-maker, a creator of traditional Christmas toys and a multi-generational musical farming family. Narrated by Hugh Bonneville

programme.title: Sounds Like It's Christmas with Ken Bruce
programme.desc: The broadcaster puts together his perfect Christmas playlist and talks to some of the stars behind the songs, who go on to choose their own festive favourites. Featuring Jona Lewie, Boney M's Liz Mitchell, Roy Wood, East 17's Tony Mortimer, the Darkness frontman Justin Hawkins, Pauline Black, producer Pete Waterman, Lauren Layfield and Aled Jones

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: New York cop John McClane visits Los Angeles to see his family over the Christmas holiday. Stopping off at his wife's place of work, he realises armed men have taken over the building and are holding the corporation's staff to ransom - and only he has the ability to fight back. Action thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman and Bonnie Bedelia

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Jack Ryan foils an assassination attempt by an IRA splinter group, killing one of the terrorists in the process. However, he becomes caught in a lethal game of cat-and-mouse with the dead man's revenge-seeking brother. Thriller based on Tom Clancy's novel, starring Harrison Ford, Sean Bean, Samuel L Jackson, Richard Harris and James Earl Jones, reprising his role from earlier Clancy adaptation The Hunt for Red October

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frederick shows up sporting a shocking new look and ignores Frasier to spend time with a girl. Eddie becomes the centre of attention, and Martin unwittingly eats a marijuana-laced brownie. Kelsey Grammer and John Mahoney star

programme.title: Ultimate Christmas Gift Guide with Josie Gibson
programme.desc: Part one of two. Josie is joined by celebrity guests, including Ollie Locke and Jenny Eclair, and various experts to explore and review the latest festive buys across all price ranges and offer money and time-saving hacks. With plenty of ideas to make Christmas the best and most memorable ever, whatever the budget, Josie has viewers covered

programme.title: Ultimate Christmas Gift Guide with Josie Gibson
programme.desc: Part two of two. Josie is joined by celebrity guests, including Ollie Locke and Jenny Eclair, and various experts to explore and review the latest festive buys across all price ranges and offer money and time-saving hacks. programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Nadia DiDonato, creative director of Liberty Entertainment Group, plans to make the business work more efficiently in this increasingly competitive industry - where a large proportion of new venues fail. She goes undercover at her own bars and restaurants, but finds the manual work of cleaning dirty cups and dishes a tougher job than she imagined

programme.title: Junior Taskmaster
programme.sub-title: Shout-out to Slow Maths Season 1, Episode 7
programme.desc: Contestants - all aged between nine and 11 - are on tenterhooks as they compete in the second semi-final. Junior Taskmaster Rose Matafeo scrutinises their every move and loyal assistant Mike Wozniak offers moral support as the hopefuls pull no punches moving caterpillars, playing football and doing some good old-fashioned detective work

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked
programme.desc: The singing rodents cause mayhem while performing on a tropical cruise, before they find themselves stranded on a desert island. As they search for a way to get back to civilisation, it becomes clear that they are not alone. Comedy sequel, starring Jason Lee and Jenny Slate, with the voices of Justin Long, Matthew Gray Gubler and Jesse McCartney

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Kill Gil, Volumes I & II Season 18, Episode 8
programme.desc: Department store Santa Gil grants Lisa's Christmas wish, but loses his job as a result. Feeling guilty, the family offers him a bed for the night - but he promptly moves in, along with all of his belongings. As the uninvited lodger becomes a pest, Marge looks for ways to get rid of him

programme.desc: Sam is delighted when Rebecca invites him back to her place and thinks all his Christmases have come at once. Meanwhile, Norm and a group of professional Santas look forward to the end of the festive season. American bar-room comedy starring Ted Danson and Kirstie Alley

programme.desc: Sam has second thoughts about selling his beloved car and goes as far as romancing the buyer's widow to get it back. Meanwhile, Rebecca befriends a pig destined to be Woody's dinner. Bar-room comedy, starring Ted Danson and Kirstie Alley

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Bubbly co-host Dr Mary joins Frasier to present a Christmas parade, but he is forced to take drastic action when she steals his limelight. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray buys Debra an expensive Christmas present in the hope she will be grateful enough to let him go on a weekend golf trip with friends, but has not anticipated that she is getting him an even more extravagant gift. Comedy, starring Ray Romano and Patricia Heaton

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.sub-title: The Thought That Counts Season 7, Episode 11
programme.desc: Ray lies to Debra, pretending he has bought her something extra special for Christmas - then has to seek Robert's advice to choose a gift that lives up to his extravagant claims. Comedy, starring Ray Romano and Brad Garrett

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Marie receives a letter in which a relative boasts about how well her children are doing, and responds by enlisting Debra's help to concoct a fictitious catalogue of her own family's achievements. Doris Roberts and Ray Romano star

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.sub-title: All I Want for Christmas Season 2, Episode 12

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray thinks a family portrait would make the perfect Christmas present for his parents, but does not count on it causing an argument about who should be in the picture

programme.desc: A snowstorm leaves Bart, Lisa and their fellow students trapped inside Springfield Elementary and it is not long before the pupils are running amok. Homer and Ned Flanders are left to mount the rescue operation to save the kids - and Principal Skinner

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: After a failed Black Friday shopping spree, Marge is determined to fix Christmas, but Homer and the kids surprise Marge with a holiday at a Florida resort

programme.desc: The team at Woodgreen animal charity hope to find their abandoned dogs new homes before Christmas. Lady the Cocker Spaniel has to overcome her shyness when she meets Elizabeth, her sister Sarah and her Afghan Hound Florence

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great Christmas Bake Off 2022 Season 13, Episode 11
programme.desc: Matt Lucas and Noel Fielding present a festive special featuring five contestants from classic Channel 4 programmes. Gaby Roslin (The Big Breakfast), Tony Robinson (Time Team), Miquita Oliver (Popworld), Terry Christian (The Word) and Claire Sweeney (Brookside) are the ones competing for the title of Christmas Star Baker - and hoping for a Hollywood handshake along the way. As a special treat, the show ends with a performance by the English National Ballet

programme.desc: The grand final sees the winners from each heat challenged to create a showstopping Christmas table. Kirstie Allsopp presents, joined by guest judge Patrick Grant, who has the unenviable task of choosing the winner. Patrick also rolls up his handmade sleeves to fashion a stylish pinecone wreath

programme.title: Jamie Cooks Christmas
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jamie Oliver demonstrates festive recipes, beginning with cheesy filo parcels with a cranberry dip, and a cauliflower lasagne using the hasselback technique and a festive jerk-inspired rub, paired with chicken, sausage and bacon party kebabs to get his guests in the party mood. Jamie also mixes up walnuts, Medjool dates and festive spices to make a sticky toffee coffee pudding

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: With sport and weather

programme.title: Jamie Cooks Christmas
programme.desc: Part two of two. Jamie invites his family to join him in his outdoor kitchen shed and makes smoked trout pâté, served with red cabbage slaw and a giant Yorkshire pudding for sharing. He gives the traditional turkey a run for its money with festive porchetta, crispy root veg and roast potatoes, and also takes a Christmas staple to new heights in his vegetarian main, a chestnut and Brussels sprouts pie

programme.title: Junior Taskmaster
programme.desc: Rose Matafeo and Mike Wozniak present the Junior Taskmaster final, in which one champion will be chosen and presented with a spectacular golden trophy of Rose's head. programme.title: Christmas at Lapland UK
programme.desc: Documentary delving behind the scenes at the Christmas tourist attraction, which creates a festive world of elves and reindeers deep in the woods of Royal Berkshire. The family run enterprise has expanded to employ Hollywood set builders and costume designers, and thousands of talented performers, to bring Father Christmas's home to life in the UK

programme.desc: Unlucky US assassin Ladybug is given a simple mission - retrieve a metal briefcase on a high-speed train departing from Tokyo. The pick-up is too easy, but Ladybug discovers that four other killers are on board the same train, and that their missions have something in common. John Wick director David Leitch's comedy thriller, starring Brad Pitt, Joey King, Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Sandra Bullock

programme.desc: A CIA analyst gets caught up in the Colombian drug trade while trying to track down terrorists responsible for the murder of a close friend of the US president - but his investigations point to illegal activity and corruption at the very top of government. Action thriller, based on Tom Clancy's novel, with Harrison Ford reprising his role from Patriot Games alongside Willem Dafoe, Anne Archer and James Earl Jones

programme.title: Royal Palaces at Christmas

There is the tale of how Sandringham became a Christmas palace thanks to a wayward Prince of Wales needing a country home for feasting and entertaining, and how Elizabeth II would travel to Norfolk for Christmas by commuter train

programme.title: Royal Christmas Traditions: Then & Now
programme.desc: A look at what the royal family get up to during the festive period, revealing how King Charles and his family create their perfect royal Christmas at Sandringham. From holiday stresses to surprising traditions like Henry VIII's love of turkey, the programme uncovers the regal roots of some of our own cherished festivities, while royal insiders also divulge the secrets of hosting a truly royal Christmas

programme.title: When Christmas TV Goes Horribly Wrong
programme.desc: Noddy Holder narrates this extended special looking at the unplanned, unwanted but often hilarious moments that have beset the world of TV during the festive season. Festive cock-ups include Christmas trees that won't stand up and kids' toys that won't shut up, via the worst yuletide movie ever and some distinctly misguided TV adverts. Clips feature a host of stars, including Eamonn Holmes and iconic TV chef Fanny Cradock, while things go horribly wrong for Piers Morgan at a Christmas lights switch-on and singer Patti LaBelle forgets the words in front of then-US president Bill Clinton

programme.title: 48 Hrs
programme.desc: A hard-bitten cop goes on the trail of two escaped fugitives who killed several of his fellow officers. He needs someone with inside knowledge of the criminals, and is reluctantly forced to temporarily release a fast-talking thief from prison to help him in his investigation. Comedy thriller, starring Nick Nolte, Eddie Murphy and Annette O'Toole

programme.title: Dragonball Evolution
programme.desc: An ordinary teenager is recruited by a mystical martial arts master for a vitally important quest. He must find seven magical spheres before they fall into the hands of an evil warlord, who intends to use their power to let him take over the world. Fantasy adventure based on the Japanese cartoon series, starring Justin Chatwin, Chow Yun-Fat and James Marsters

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Three bungling kidnappers hatch a plan to pose as society reporters and snatch the baby son of a wealthy couple. However, the infant escapes on to the streets of New York, evading the crooks' every attempt to recapture him. Comedy, starring Joe Mantegna, Lara Flynn Boyle, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: A minor-league ice hockey player is nicknamed the Tooth Fairy for knocking opponents' teeth out on the ice. When the cynical athlete discourages a young fan, he is forced to pay penance by spending a week as the real Tooth Fairy, rediscovering his dreams in the process. Family comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Ashley Judd, Stephen Merchant, Ryan Sheckler and Seth MacFarlane

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: Nightclub singer Deloris Van Cartier agrees to testify against her gangster boyfriend after witnessing a murder. Placed in protective custody by the authorities, she is less than pleased to discover she is expected to pose as chaste nun Sister Mary Clarence in a convent. Comedy, starring Whoopi Goldberg, Harvey Keitel, Maggie Smith, Bill Nunn and Kathy Najimy

programme.title: Fisherman's Friends
programme.desc: A music executive heads out to a Cornish fishing village on a mission to recruit a group of 10 local fishermen into recording an album of sea shanties. He struggles to win over the unlikely boy band and their families, but begins to gain a new appreciation for their traditional values. Comedy, starring James Purefoy, Daniel Mays and Tuppence Middleton

programme.title: Honest Thief
programme.desc: A bank robber falls in love, and decides the time has come to bring his life of crime to an end. He turns himself in to the FBI, only to be double-crossed by two crooked agents. Crime thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Kate Walsh and Jai Courtney

programme.title: Bad Times at the El Royale
programme.desc: In the late 1960s, several strangers, many with a secret to bury, meet by chance at a rundown Lake Tahoe hotel with a dark past. During the course of one night, everyone will show their true colours. Director Drew Goddard's mystery thriller, starring Jeff Bridges, Cynthia Erivo, Dakota Johnson and Chris Hemsworth

programme.title: Werewolves Within
programme.desc: A proposed gas pipeline divides the small town of Beaverfield. The day its residents meet at the local inn, a severe snowstorm batters the area, trapping everyone inside the establishment. As tensions between the opposing sides heighten, it is up to forest ranger Finn and postal worker Cecily to keep the peace and find out the person responsible for the appearance of a mysterious creature that is terrorising the community. Horror comedy, starring Sam Richardson and Milana Vayntrub

programme.title: Dr Who and the Daleks
programme.desc: The eccentric time-traveller journeys to the Daleks' home world, which has been devastated by their nuclear weapons. He enters their city and finds them engaged in a plot to exterminate their peaceful humanoid enemies the Thals. Sci-fi adventure based on the TV series, starring Peter Cushing, Roy Castle, Jennie Linden and Roberta Tovey

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: A reporter discovers four humanoid amphibians who live in the sewers of New York, and use their martial arts skills to fight crime. She helps them as they face their toughest challenge yet - defeating a sinister criminal organisation that seems to have power over the entire city. Fantasy adventure, starring Megan Fox and William Fichtner, with the voice of Johnny Knoxville

programme.title: Spies in Disguise
programme.desc: A secret agent branded a traitor tries to clear his name, with the aid of a socially awkward inventor he had fired for only developing non-lethal gadgets. The scientist's latest invention gets out of control and transforms the spy into a pigeon - giving him the perfect disguise to prove his innocence. Animated adventure, with the voices of Will Smith, Tom Holland and Karen Gillan

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A private eye is recruited by a group of Buddhist mystics and sent on a mission to rescue an abducted boy whose supernatural powers will enable him to bring about world peace. However, the kidnapper is actually a demon in human form, determined to ensure the youngster does not fulfil his destiny. Comedy fantasy adventure, starring Eddie Murphy, Charles Dance and Charlotte Lewis

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two squabbling brothers with time on their hands decide to play a mysterious old board game after finding it in their basement. A chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Josh Hutcherson, Jonah Bobo, Kristen Stewart, Tim Robbins and Dax Shepard.

programme.title: We Live in Time Interview Special
Dog
programme.desc: US Army Ranger Briggs is determined to regain his place at Joint Base Lewis-McChord in Washington. His superior officer agrees to return him to the fold if he can successfully escort a military working dog named Lulu along America's Pacific Coast to attend the funeral of her handler. Comedy, co-directed by and starring Channing Tatum

programme.title: Spencer
programme.desc: During her Christmas holidays with the royal family at the Sandringham estate in Norfolk, Diana decides to leave her marriage to Prince Charles, the family, and the life that comes with it. Drama, starring Kristen Stewart, Timothy Spall and Sally Hawkins

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: A housewife trapped in a loveless marriage in 1950s New York forms a close attachment with a younger woman seeking fulfilment in her own life. A passionate secret affair develops, but as her husband grows suspicious, she finds her competence as a parent being called into question. Romantic drama based on Patricia Highsmith's novel The Price of Salt, starring Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara

programme.title: One Million Years BC
programme.desc: A caveman falls for a woman from a rival clan, forcing the lovers to flee from their villages to escape the anger of the tribal chieftains - and survive attacks by man-eating dinosaurs and the dangers of sporadic earthquakes. Hammer-produced prehistoric adventure, starring Raquel Welch, John Richardson, Robert Brown and Percy Herbert, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: In 1987, lonely Californian teenager Charlie Watson is traumatised by the death of her father and resentful of her mother Sally's relationship with new boyfriend Ronald. For her 18th-birthday she's given a yellow Volkswagen Beetle, which turns out to be the battle-scarred Autobot Bumblebee. Transformers prequel, starring Hailee Steinfeld, John Cena and Jorge Lendeborg Jr

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: The shape-changing robots are driven into hiding when the human race turns against them. When rediscovered by a kindly inventor and his daughter, they come out of exile to save the world, battling a new breed of human-created Transformers. These deadly new machines were created to hunt them down, but are now growing independent and intend to make use of technology from the Transformers' home planet in a plot that could threaten all life on Earth. Fourth film in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Mark Wahlberg, Stanley Tucci and Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: We Live in Time Interview Special
Hunter Killer
programme.desc: Unconventional submarine skipper Joe Glass is sent to investigate the torpedoing of US and Russian vessels. He winds up trying to rescue the Russian president, who has been kidnapped by a rogue general. Action thriller, starring Gerard Butler, Gary Oldman and Common

programme.title: Prey
programme.desc: In 1719 on the Northern Great Plains, Comanche tracker Naru undertakes a rite of passage to slay a ferocious predator. During a fierce tussle with a mountain lion, Naru glimpses strange lights in the treeline: a warning that a highly evolved, otherworldly creature with cloaking technology and explosive armaments is at large on the plains. Sci-fi thriller Predator prequel, starring Amber Midthunder and Dakota Beavers

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: An elite military team takes on a top-secret mission in the jungles of Central America, but the soldiers realise they have been deceived by their CIA employers. A greater danger presents itself when they are stalked by a lethal alien big-game hunter with the power to become invisible, that has come to Earth to stalk human prey. Sci-fi thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Carl Weathers and Bill Duke

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.sub-title: Dreaming of a White Porsche Christmas Season 10, Episode 6
programme.desc: Stan makes a wish upon his Christmas tree angel to become single once again - which then comes true. Meanwhile, Principal Lewis's dreams come true when he takes on Stan's family

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Steve gets into new-age mysticism after discovering that life as an adult will be nothing but misery and cynicism, while Roger creates a low-budget adult series called Bang Van

programme.title: Celebrity Karaoke Club
programme.desc: It's the semi-final and joining the club tonight are Ibiza Weekender's Jordan Davies and Radio 1's Yasmin Evans

programme.title: The Stand Up Sketch Show
programme.desc: The Stand Up Sketch Show is back with a weekly hit of breakneck laugh-out-loud comedy, featuring stand-up routines from the best comedians on the circuit. This edition features Seann Walsh, Chris Hall, Jack Skipper, Tadiwa Mahlunge, Lindsey Santoro, Finlay Christie and Dee Allum

programme.title: The Stand Up Sketch Show
programme.desc: Comedy show that combines stand-up and sketches and features established stand-up routines by some of the nation's best-loved comedians and new material from Britain's most exciting talent. Each sketch begins with a comedian telling their story in front of a live audience before shifting into a surreal reconstruction of their material - this edition has routines from Rhys James, Helen Bauer, Gbemi Oladipo, Ian Smith, Red Richardson, Aurie Styla, Bobby Mair and Esther Manito

programme.title: Hey Tracey!
programme.desc: Joel Dommett hosts this festive edition of the comedy quiz show where celebrities cold-call real people around the UK. Tonight, Baga Chipz, AJ and Curtis Pritchard, Tom Lucy, Seann Walsh and Samira Mighty try to win some normal people £2,500 and some teeth whitening

programme.title: Totally Bonkers Guinness World Records
programme.desc: Matt Edmonds offers his unique insights on some Guinness World Records, including the world's shortest and longest cats, the highest waterfall jump and the longest underwater kiss

programme.title: Totally Bonkers Guinness World Records
programme.desc: Matt Edmonds narrates a selection of some of the most incredible and peculiar record-breaking attempts, including the most snails on one person's face, the fastest time to tape a person to a wall, and the quickest consumption of a raw onion

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.sub-title: Grand Canyon Canary/ Hole in Dumb Season 4, Episode 8
programme.desc: Sylvester pursues Tweety Bird at the Grand Canyon, and Elmer Fudd wants to play golf but doesn't want Daffy Duck to be his caddy

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.sub-title: Red, White and Bruised / Beaky Buzzard Gags: Bunny / Jet Porkpelled Season 2, Episode 1
programme.desc: Tweety Bird builds a nest in a military base to keep safe from Sylvester. Beaky Buzzard goes hunting. Porky tries Daffy Duck's new jet pack

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Animated series. The Titans and an alien friend of theirs encounter Krampus when they find themselves seeking shelter from the cold in a mysterious castle.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Control Freak thinks that the Titans' humour is too juvenile for their time slot, so he ages them down into a preschool show

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.sub-title: Batcomputer for a Day Season 1, Episode 15
programme.desc: When Batcomputer shuts down for a system update, the other Batwheels take over for her while aiding Batman in a battle against Harley Quinn.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After being called on stage at a hypnotist show, Mr. Bean returns home, but he is not exactly himself

programme.title: Dodo
programme.desc: Wickedly sharp animated series following a boy navigating the dramas and pitfalls of Year 7 and trying to fit in. It's Christmas and Joe is arguing with his older brother Jamie, who has spent years playing cruel Christmas-related pranks on Joe. This year will be different though, as it's Jamie's turn to sleep in Joe's room and he will therefore be in control - however, when Joe receives his first-ever text message from Lily Scott, he is distracted and dreams of a future with Lily on the moon.

programme.title: Dodo
programme.desc: Wickedly sharp animated series following a boy navigating the dramas and pitfalls of Year 7 and trying to fit in. When Joe's morning routine is disrupted by his brother Jamie, he is soon faced with having to use the toilets at school for the first time

programme.title: Big Top Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The cowardly canine and his friends investigate a circus that is being menaced by werewolves. The guys go undercover as performers to search for the truth, only to find a connection between the monsters and Shaggy's favourite Swedish heavy metal band. Animated comedy, with the voices of Frank Welker and Matthew Lillard

programme.title: Totally Bonkers Guinness World Records
programme.desc: Matt Edmondson narrates a selection of some of the most incredible and peculiar record-breaking attempts, featuring the longest motorcycle jump, the loudest burp and the tightest parallel parking. He also reveals the oddest record in the book

programme.title: Dress to Impress
programme.desc: Healthcare co-ordinator Brad from Pontefract in West Yorkshire puts his faith in the fashion choices of Ashley, James and Mike

programme.title: Dress to Impress

programme.title: Inspector Morse
programme.desc: Ghosts from the past return to haunt Morse as he investigates the apparent suicide of a terminally ill Oxford don whose widow turns out to be the woman the detective was set to marry in his youth. As the case develops, Lewis worries his partner's professionalism is being undermined. Starring John Thaw and Kevin Whately, with Joanna David, Samantha Bond, David Haig, Adrian Dunbar and James Grout

programme.title: Inspector Morse
programme.desc: The murder of a well-known business tycoon leads Morse to investigate the man's feuding family, and inadvertently makes him the unwitting target of a hate campaign by the tabloids - a problem compounded by his uneasy relationship with a new chief superintendent. John Thaw and Kevin Whately star alongside Gwen Taylor, Martin Clunes, Alun Armstrong, Anna Massey, Charlotte Coleman and Rupert Graves

programme.title: Christmas Lights
programme.desc: Colin and Howie are brothers-in-law who have always competed against each other. When Christmas comes around, both are determined to have the biggest and brightest decorations, and it seems they will stop at nothing to out-do each other - even risking their marriages and lifelong friendship. Comedy drama, with Robson Green, Mark Benton, Nicola Stephenson, Maxine Peake and Keith Clifford

programme.title: Clash of the Santas
programme.desc: Robson Green and Mark Benton reprise their roles as feuding brothers-in-law Colin and Howie, from Christmas Lights, Northern Lights and City Lights, in a festive special. The pair travel to Lithuania, where Christmas cynic Howie has been nominated to represent England in the annual Santa competition, much to the annoyance of Colin, who believes his love of all things festive and his appearances in the white beard at the school fair make him the ideal candidate. However, he has to settle for being his friend's little elf - and to make matters worse, the other elves are a bunch of cheerleading girls. So with a Saint Nick who refuses to believe and an elf who wants the top job, it seems their chances of winning are slight. Comedy drama, co-starring Nicola Stephenson, Sian Reeves, Ian Puleston-Davies, Edward Petherbridge and Emma Cunniffe

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: It's a time of joy and happiness in Midsomer for once - Christmas is coming, and DCI Barnaby and his wife Sarah are soon to become parents. But the festive mood changes when a man is stabbed to death with an antique sword during a ghost-hunting party at a spooky manor house in Morton Shallows. Local historian Brendan Pearce thinks blacksmith's daughter Rose Wilton is seeking revenge from beyond the grave, but Barnaby and sidekick Charlie Nelson try to find a more earthly motive behind the murder. Starring Neil Dudgeon and Gwilym Lee, with Fiona Dolman, Les Dennis, Elizabeth Berrington, Mark Heap, Emily Joyce, James Murray and Hannah Tointon

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Sergeant Troy is promoted to Inspector, but before he can consider his future he has to help Barnaby investigate the collapse of a tunnel which has exposed a collection of ancient skeletons - and more recent remains among the bones suggest links to a nearby double shooting. Murder mystery, starring John Nettles, Daniel Casey, Cherie Lunghi and David Bradley

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: DCI Stanhope is called to a lighthouse where a body has been discovered lashed to a sailing boat. Immediately setting about her investigation, Vera soon discovers that the body is local council enforcement officer and experienced amateur sailor Frank Channing, a family man, with strong friendships, who was well respected at work. However, it's not long before Vera discovers evidence suggesting foul play

programme.title: Lewis
programme.sub-title: Entry Wounds - Part One Season 8, Episode 1
programme.desc: The last run of the detective drama ended with Lewis (Kevin Whately) starting a new life away from the force, but it seems that peace and quiet doesn't suit him - which is just as well, as newly promoted DI Hathaway (Laurence Fox) is struggling to find a sidekick, and within just four weeks is already on to his second sergeant, DS Lizzie Maddox (Angela Griffin). So, Chief Superintendent Innocent (Rebecca Front) decides to reunite the former partners to look into the murder of a neurosurgeon, a case with potential links to the worlds of animal rights and blood sports. In the first of this two-part story, suspicion falls on glamorous widow Erica (Kara Tointon), but it turns out there are plenty of other people in the victim's inner circle who were driven by fear and loathing

programme.title: Inspector Morse
programme.desc: Lewis joins Morse on a trip to Australia, but it is no holiday - they are pursuing a former supergrass who holds the key to a mystery back in Oxford. Going deep into the heart of the Outback, Morse soon begins to miss the comforts of home, particularly his regular tipple, although Lewis finds he has more in common with his Aussie brethren than he thought. Crime drama, starring John Thaw, Kevin Whately and Con O'Neill

programme.title: Kate & Koji
programme.desc: When her lifelong enemy suddenly decides to make amends, Kate thinks she smells a rat. Meanwhile, Koji develops a curious symptom. Comedy, starring Brenda Blethyn and Okorie Chukwu

programme.desc: Kate ignores her friends' advice and stands against Councillor Bone as the local police and crime commissioner. Medium is set to leave for a job abroad, while Koji's appeal is going badly and it looks as if Kate may be left alone

programme.desc: George has already denounced the neighbours as toffee-nosed snobs, and events make Mildred wonder whether he could be right. Queenie Watts and Michael Robbins guest star, with Yootha Joyce and Brian Murphy

programme.desc: Mike attracts the unwanted attentions of a famous romantic novelist who has moved to the area in search of literary inspiration, while borstal boys on a work placement cause mayhem in the village. Crime drama, starring David Jason, Larry Lamb, Bruce Alexander, Lindy Whiteford and Berwick Kaler

programme.sub-title: The Things We Do for Love Season 4, Episode 3
programme.desc: The discovery of a woman's body in a car park presents Jack Frost with another challenge to his deductive powers. Delving into the victim's electronic organiser, he learns she was connected with a local religious community - and realises someone in the congregation is more interested in the pleasures of this world than the rewards of the next. David Jason stars, with Bruce Alexander and John Lyons

programme.title: Inspector Morse
programme.desc: The detective discovers his half-sister's daughter has committed suicide and sets out to find what prompted it, entering the world of teenage rave parties and drug-taking. programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Robert has to make what could be a far-reaching decision about the recent bombshell. Rose, meanwhile, seems more concerned with persuading him to buy a wireless than what is happening to those around her - but then again, she's always been trapped in her own self-centred little world. In the kitchen, Mrs Patmore thinks she may have found a way to help Daisy cope with her studies, while Thomas' devious ways look set to scupper Baxter's friendship with Molesley. Finally, as Lord Merton continues to woo Isobel, Anna is reluctantly drawn into Mary's latest scheme

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Lady Mary's secret assignation with Lord Gillingham is almost exposed - until Violet saves the day. It seems that the battleaxe may have more reason than most to sympathise with her granddaughter's position when a face from her past reappears, hinting at a hidden past of her own. Meanwhile, Carson is dismissive of Mrs Patmore's latest problem, Branson receives a proposition about the estate's future and the circumstances of nasty valet Green's demise are scrutinised - again

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Sarah Bunting continues to wage her one-woman war against the Crawleys - before pushing them too far. Violet is too busy getting flustered about Prince Kuragin to notice, and finally confides in Isobel the truth about their shared past. Following her illicit trip to Liverpool with Lord Gillingham, Mary makes a decision about their relationship - but does it have any future? Thomas returns to Downton a shadow of his former self, and Baxter wonders if there's more to his mystery illness than he's letting on. Rose's father Shrimpie (guest star Peter Egan) is also back on the estate - with shocking news

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Lady Cora enjoys the attention Simon Bricker gives her, but is he about to cross a line - and does she want him to? Cora's eldest child, Mary, is also enjoying male company, this time that of Charles Blake, who's about to do her a big favour. Meanwhile, Rose meets a dashing stranger, Branson makes up his mind about Sarah Bunting and Anna is disturbed by a visit from Inspector Vyner

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Following the altercation, relations between Robert and Cora are strained, while Blake's scheming starts to come to fruition when Mary is unexpectedly pitted against her love rival. Edith decides to take drastic measures after receiving terrible news, leaving various parties reeling. Baxter is embroiled in the investigation into Green's death following a mysterious tip-off, and as Thomas's health deteriorates, he finally reveals the truth to the maid. Elsewhere, love is in the air for more than one member of the Crawley family. Guest starring Sue Johnston (The Royle Family, Coronation Street)

programme.desc: A local woman is found murdered following a row with her husband at a residents' association Spanish-themed evening. The finger of suspicion soon points to an odd-job man with a violent history, and the chairman of the association reveals he heard a squeaking noise after the victim left - but the witness promptly winds up dead himself. Crime drama, starring John Nettles

programme.sub-title: For the Grace of God Season 12, Episode 2
programme.desc: Adapting to civilian life was not easy for Lance Corporal Conn Burns and after a series of bad life choices, he found himself desolate, down and out on the streets of Newcastle. Attempting to get his life back on track, Conn had recently been making moves that would see him repay old debts, rebuild relationships and get him off the streets. DCI Stanhope is called in after the body of Burns is discovered, and unearths secrets from his past and betrayal in the present

programme.title: Mr Bates vs the Post Office
programme.desc: After a new computer system called Horizon is installed across the country, mysterious financial losses start to appear in village post office tills. But when subpostmasters Alan Bates, Jo Hamilton, Noel Thomas and Lee Castleton seek help, the Post Office insists that each of them is the only one having problems. Alan, stubborn and computer-literate, refuses to put it behind him and is sure that one day he'll find the evidence to prove them wrong. Bafta award-winning, fact-based drama, starring Toby Jones, Monica Dolan and Julie Hesmondhalgh

programme.title: Mr Bates vs the Post Office
programme.desc: Alan and his friends meet Sam Kaur, who is due to stand trial, and Michael Rudkin, who has insider knowledge of Horizon. Jo and Alan take their cause to Westminster where James Arbuthnot MP persuades the Post Office to hire an independent investigator. Bob Rutherford becomes convinced of the honesty of the subpostmasters as he starts work and finds evidence of faults in the IT systems, his report rattles Paula Vennells who approaches Alan to find a solution

programme.title: Lewis
programme.sub-title: The Lions of Nemea Season 8, Episode 1
programme.desc: Hathaway appears to have got over his fear of Lewis treading over his newly promoted toes. Their opposites have attracted in the past, and there seems no reason to suspect that they won't now the younger man has got used to the idea of his former mentor coming out of retirement to lend him a hand. Even DS Maddox isn't getting on Hathaway's nerves quite as much, so this rejuvenated trio sets out to discover who murdered American classics student Rose Anderson, whose body has been hauled from the canal with neck and abdomen wounds. programme.sub-title: Wild at Heart Christmas Special Season 7, Episode 11
programme.desc: Feature-length finale of the African-set wildlife drama. It's New Year's Eve and Alice has returned to Leopard's Den, but the stress of combining work with caring for a baby is causing tension between her and Danny. They then receive devastating news - two cheetahs have been taken by poachers. With only days until the wedding of Rosie and Dylan - who isn't endearing himself to anybody - tempers are already running high when Du Plessis finds out his heart is weak. Realising he must use his remaining time to help the family, he persuades pilot Dylan to fly them all to Zimbabwe to rescue the stolen animals in the hope that the trip will convince Danny his future son-in-law is worthy. Stephen Tompkinson, Dawn Steele, Lucy-Jo Hudson and Hayley Mills star

programme.title: Heartbeat

Elsewhere, the atmosphere is much more tense, as Dr Ormerod and nurse Meryl Taylor are called out to help a boy who has been trapped below the surface of an icy lake for 20 minutes - and to make matters worse, the ambulance carrying the unconscious lad back to hospital gets caught in a snowdrift. On a lighter note, Ray Piper is brought in with a huge bump on his head - and there's much hilarity when it turns out his wife has hit him with a frozen turkey. programme.desc: The season of goodwill descends on the Larkin household, and the family celebrates the 'perfick' Christmas. Drama, based on the characters created by HE Bates, starring David Jason, Pam Ferris and Catherine Zeta-Jones

programme.desc: Secrets could be exposed as Rosamund arrives at Downton following Edith's shock departure. programme.title: The Storms That Stole Christmas
programme.desc: Trees were felled, trains were cancelled, Gatwick Airport was in chaos and 50,000 homeowners made do without power. This documentary, the first of two telling the stories of those who bore the brunt of the bad weather over Christmas 2013 and the surrounding period, features amateur footage, eyewitness testimony and expert commentary

programme.title: The Emergency Ward
programme.desc: Dr Michelle Thornhill treats a 55-year-old DJ who collapsed with severe heart and breathing issues. A senior nurse becomes a patient after being stung by a swarm of bees

programme.title: Inside the Bomb Squad
programme.desc: Members of the Army's EOD and Search Regiment head to the Isle of Man, where police believe they have found a bomb-making factory in a garage, while Sgt David Podmore investigates when the coastguard reports a possible torpedo on a Wirral beach

programme.title: Inside the Bomb Squad
programme.desc: Sgt David Podmore is called to investigate an explosive substance in his unit's home city of Chester, where police have found an arsenal of weapons, but are unsure of a chemical giving off smoke and have evacuated the area. The highly skilled search team uses hi-tech equipment and specialist dogs to look for weapons and explosive devices at the Birmingham hotel being used by for the Conservative Party Conference

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Stuart, who's 40, is admitted to hospital after being involved in a high-speed collision with multiple cyclists during a race, and a CT scan reveals that he is bleeding internally. Meanwhile, 83-year-old Elicia-Jean collapsed at home after experiencing dizziness, and doctors think she may have an infection

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jo and Ellis from East Sussex cannot wait to buy a holiday home on Spain's Costa Blanca, where they plan to spend every moment in the sunshine indulging their passion for water sports and mountain biking. Laura Hamilton leaves no stone unturned, showing them five properties for their budget of £60,000

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Jimmy Doherty travels to Turkey to investigate oregano, Kate Quilton examines the worrying rise in peanut allergies and Matt Tebbutt traces the British blackcurrant from the field to the Ribena factory

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Sue and Simon Parry from Bedfordshire are looking for a second home on the Costa Tropical, where they plan to spend up to three quarters of the year enjoying the glorious Spanish sunshine. Using their £140,000 budget, Laura Hamilton lines up five options for the pair to consider, but will any of them fit the bill?

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: There's chaos at a B&B in France when a pipe bursts during check in. A restaurateur in Portugal runs out of cutlery, a family of brewers from Kent launch their beer at a prestigious market, while at a B&B in Italy, the guests cannot find the bidet

programme.title: Matt Baker: Travels with Mum & Dad
programme.sub-title: Matt Baker: Christmas Travels with Mum & Dad
programme.desc: Matt Baker takes his parents on a glorious Christmas trip to the Lake District, where they visit Beatrix Potter's hilltop home and try festive felting using local Herdwick wool. Mike gets an early present when he visits the Ruskin Museum to see a display dedicated to his hero - speed record holder Donald Campbell

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Shop manager Nicola Steele hosts the first dinner party in Cardiff, and hopes that her dog-themed surprises and unusual entertainment will impress her guests - army wife Rachael Smith, casting agency owner Jerry Lockett, childminder Andrea Grainger and chatterbox Sam Clark - and win her the £1,000 cash prize

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Jerry Lockett hosts the second dinner party in Cardiff, and following a flood at his home, hopes to impress his guests by serving the meal at the grand venue of his cousin's mansion

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Army wife Rachael Smith hosts the third party in Cardiff, allowing her competitive edge and no-nonsense approach to come to the fore in her bid to pick up the £1,000 prize

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Costume designer Sam Clarke prepares a Mexican menu for the fourth dinner party in Cardiff. Everything does not go to plan, however, when two guests begin fighting at the table, and his 'fun' game leaves everyone in tears

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Childminder Andrea Grainger hosts the last dinner party as the competition in Cardiff draws to a close. She hopes a menu of traditional Welsh dishes will help her secure the prize, and lines up a selection of games to improve her chances of success. As the evening comes to an end, the diners discover which of the meals made the best impression

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The first destination of the week is Northlands Farm in Chichester, where host Keith offers the full farm experience and an afternoon of paddleboarding on his very own lake

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Claire hosts the second visit of the week at the Mad Hatters Campsite in Ely, Cambridgeshire. Martha and Lisa love the Wonderland theme but Giovanni and Enzo are not happy with the lack of ensuite

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Lisa and Martha host the third visit of the week at The Redan Inn in Chilcompton, Somerset. The guests love the quirky interiors and breakfast goes down a treat but Giovanni and Enzo get picky about plates

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final visit of the week is to The Limes in Maldon, Essex. Hosts Giovanni and Enzo hope their luxurious rooms will impress their guests - and the B&Bers are certainly happy to drink in the additional extras at check-in. They spend the afternoon at nearby Radio Caroline, the famous pirate radio station on a boat in Chelmsford. Breakfast dazzles most of the guests, and Giovanni and Enzo think they're onto a winner

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.sub-title: Fri 20 Oct 2023: Payment Day Season 2023, Episode 65
programme.desc: Payment day sees Keith try to get to the bottom of the concerning cleanliness score that's been bugging him. Lisa and Martha are also keen to uncover why Enzo and Giovanni weren't blown away by their breakfast, before the boys turn the tables to quiz their rivals about some fussy feedback

programme.title: The Call of the Wild
programme.desc: A crossbreed dog stolen from his Californian home and taken north to the Yukon, where there is great demand for strong dogs to pull sleds in the frozen wilderness. As his new owner ventures deeper into the Arctic circle, the dog must rediscover his primal nature as a wild animal to survive. Historical adventure based on Jack London's novel, starring Harrison Ford and Omar Sy

programme.title: The Dog House
programme.desc: Woodgreen Pets Charity continue their mission to home abandoned dogs in time for Christmas. Fox terrier Ziggy, known for her escape attempts, tries her best to steal the hearts of the Thompson family. Winston the smiley Staffie-cross puts on the charm to win over some potential adopters and Emori the three-legged German Shepherd is introduced to retiree Pauline

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A man is rushed into Queen's Medical Centre in Nottingham after his leg is crushed by a 12-tonne lorry. He may have developed a rare condition that can require amputation. Plus, nurse Christine describes how she realised her ambitions of working in the emergency department and put herself through college to get her nursing qualification, while raising two children as a single parent

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Documentary following life inside the A&E department at Queen's Medical Centre in Nottingham. Milky, who's 38, is rushed to A&E after coming off his motorbike at high speed. Adventurous dad Shaun has landed badly after skydiving with his teenage son and six-year-old Coby is brought in after swallowing an unknown object

programme.title: Emergency Helicopter Medics
programme.desc: Two motorcyclists need specialist care, as the helicopter medics try to save the life of Pete, while Tom may have a serious spinal injury. Plus, a woman is kicked in the face by her horse. Documentary following the work of air ambulance crews
